amendment.description: To provide funds for the Northern Border Prosecutor Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3218 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3218 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S12749-12750; text: CR S12749) To provide funds for the Northern Border Prosecutor Initiative.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3218 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Murray.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3218 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
